languages.text: "Хм-м..." {n}Друкари поджимает губы в деланной задумчивости.{/n} "Хорошо. Я лично освежую тебе спину и отправлю твоих слуг за парой мешков соли для купальни..."

"Hmm..." {n}He purses his lips, pretending to be deep in thought.{/n} "If you insist. I will personally flay the skin from your back and send your servants to fetch some sacks of salt for the bath..."
languages.original_text: "Хм-м..." {n}Друкари поджимает губы в деланной задумчивости.{/n} "Хорошо. Я лично освежую тебе спину и отправлю твоих слуг за парой мешков соли для купальни..."

traits.locale_text: "Hmm..." {n}He purses his lips, pretending to be deep in thought.{/n} "If you insist. I will personally skin your back and send your servants to fetch a couple of sacks of salt for the bath..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Hmm... {n}dit-il en pinçant les lèvres et faisant mine de réfléchir.{/n} Si vous insistez. Dans ce cas, je vais personnellement vous écorcher la peau du dos, puis je demanderai à vos serviteurs de m'apporter des sacs de sel pour le bain... »
languages.original_text: "Hmm..." {n}He purses his lips, pretending to be deep in thought.{/n} "If you insist. I will personally flay the skin from your back and send your servants to fetch some sacks of salt for the bath..."

traits.locale_text: « Hmm... {n}dit-il en pinçant les lèvres et faisant mine de réfléchir.{/n} Si vous insistez. Dans ce cas, je vais personnellement vous écorcher la peau du dos, puis je demanderai à vos serviteurs de m'apporter des sacs de sel pour le bain... »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Mmm...». {n}Aprieta los labios, fingiendo meditar profundamente.{/n} «Si insistes, puedo desollar personalmente tu espalda y enviar a tus sirvientes a coger unos sacos de sal para el baño...».
languages.original_text: "Hmm..." {n}He purses his lips, pretending to be deep in thought.{/n} "If you insist. I will personally flay the skin from your back and send your servants to fetch some sacks of salt for the bath..."

traits.locale_text: «Mmm...». {n}Aprieta los labios, fingiendo meditar profundamente.{/n} «Si insistes, puedo desollar personalmente tu espalda y enviar a tus sirvientes a coger unos sacos de sal para el baño...».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “嗯……”{n}他噘起嘴唇，假装在沉思。{/n}“如果你坚持的话，我可以亲自把你背上的皮剥下来，再让你的仆人拿几袋盐倒进澡盆里……”
languages.original_text: "Hmm..." {n}He purses his lips, pretending to be deep in thought.{/n} "If you insist. I will personally flay the skin from your back and send your servants to fetch some sacks of salt for the bath..."

traits.locale_text: “嗯……”{n}他噘起嘴唇，假装在沉思。{/n}“如果你坚持的话，我可以亲自把你背上的皮剥下来，再让你的仆人拿几袋盐倒进澡盆里……”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「うーむ…」{n}彼は唇を噛みしめ、深く考えているふりをした。{/n}「どうしても、と言うのなら。 私が自らあなたの背中の皮を剥いで、召使に風呂用の塩の袋を持ってこさせます…」
languages.original_text: "Hmm..." {n}He purses his lips, pretending to be deep in thought.{/n} "If you insist. I will personally flay the skin from your back and send your servants to fetch some sacks of salt for the bath..."

traits.locale_text: 「うーむ…」{n}彼は唇を噛みしめ、深く考えているふりをした。{/n}「どうしても、と言うのなら。 私が自らあなたの背中の皮を剥いで、召使に風呂用の塩の袋を持ってこさせます…」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Hmm ..." {n}Er schürzt die Lippen und gibt vor, angestrengt nachzudenken.{/n} "Wenn Ihr darauf besteht. Ich werde Euch persönlich die Haut vom Rücken abziehen und Eure Diener ein paar Säcke Salz für das Bad holen lassen ..."
languages.original_text: "Hmm..." {n}He purses his lips, pretending to be deep in thought.{/n} "If you insist. I will personally flay the skin from your back and send your servants to fetch some sacks of salt for the bath..."

traits.locale_text: "Hmm ..." {n}Er schürzt die Lippen und gibt vor, angestrengt nachzudenken.{/n} "Wenn Ihr darauf besteht. Ich werde Euch persönlich die Haut vom Rücken abziehen und Eure Diener ein paar Säcke Salz für das Bad holen lassen ..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Hımm..." {n}Dudaklarını büzerek derin derin düşünürmüş gibi yapıyor.{/n} "Madem ısrar ediyorsun... Sırtındaki deriyi şahsen yüzebilir ve hizmetkârlarını birkaç kese banyo tuzu almaya gönderebilirim..."
languages.original_text: "Hmm..." {n}He purses his lips, pretending to be deep in thought.{/n} "If you insist. I will personally flay the skin from your back and send your servants to fetch some sacks of salt for the bath..."
